title: 25 Minute stylized poro pic
body:
http://d.facdn.net/art/mileslupine/1405897535.mileslupine_poro1.png
So yeah, only took 25 minutes to make this including a quick sketch and messing around with the style a bit.

replies.body:
well drawm there ate :)

PORO FTW!
I dig it.  Add more mustache!
A poro with a greater mustache is in my to do list with art. Just got to find time between some of my other projects to work it in ^^;
So taking a bit of time to make sure I'm happy with how a pic came out is a bad thing? Heck took 3 or 4 quick sketches before I was happy with how that looked before moving on.
